description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This stick shooter pins you against endless waves of increasingly difficult evil robots that must be destroyed! Fast paced fun for 1-4 people cooperatively.  With 4 unique guns and 6 upgrades for each, you can choose your own path to survival.  From Evil Lair Games.
